page.title: 11SCHOOL
page.content: Woore County Primary School is under the administration of{Shropshire {County Council.} It is for children aged{from 5 years to 11 years. A{new school building}was opened in {December, 1983}to replace the building which had been opened in 1876. The new building is of brick, and stands in about 3 acres. The new building was designed to take 82 children. In{July,1985}there are{85 children}in the school and 4 full-time teachers. There are 3 classrooms, which open onto a practical area, which is also a cloakrrom. There is a small hall used for P.E., Music, dining as well as general use for groups of children. The school is also used for some {evening classes}for adults. At 11 years most children transfer to secondary education at{Grove School, Market Drayton.
